body_html:

Have I written custom code - No/NA
OS Platform and Distribution - RHEL 7.4 Codename: Maipo
TensorFlow installed from : https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/archive/v1.4.0-rc0.zip

GPU model and memory - eForce GTX 1080 Ti, 11 GB
Exact command to reproduce - cd tensorflow-1.4.0-rc0
./configure
bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
